title: Andrew Garfield and Amelia Dimoldenberg's 'Chicken Shop Date': Is it love?
description: Actor Andrew Garfield and YouTube host Amelia Dimoldenberg exchange flirty quips on 'Chicken Shop Date.'
excerpt: After previously meeting cute and exhibiting serious chemistry, the Brits take it to the next level.
text: Well, they've taken it to the next level. Oscar-nominated actor and Elmo confidante Andrew Garfield has finally gone on a "date" with Amanda Dimoldenberg, the creator and host of the 10-year-old YouTube chat show, Chicken Shop Date. And, yes, they are very cute together.Garfield and Dimoldenberg have generated a fair amount of buzz thanks to a couple of flirty exchanges they shared (they initially met when Dimoldenberg was covering the red carpet at the GQ "Men of the Year 2022" event and shared another moment at the 2023 Golden Globes). So, when it became known that Garfield would appear on Chicken Shop Date — where Dimoldenberg queries celebrities in the manner of an often flirty, sometimes awkward date — the shipping reached next level. The actual date, which dropped on Friday, was quite flirty and giggly, with the stoic Dimoldenberg appearing to fall victim to Garfield's intense stares, gentle teasing, and, at one point, hand holding. The conversation veered from both Brits' dating habits to Garfield's failure to win an Academy Award and even Dimoldenberg's interest in monogamy and parenthood ("What are your ultimate longings?," Garfield asked). Mashable Top Stories So, how did it end? There's definitely potential for a second date. Watch below:
html:
Well, they've taken it to the next level. Oscar-nominated actor and Elmo confidante Andrew Garfield has finally gone on a "date" with Amanda Dimoldenberg, the creator and host of the 10-year-old YouTube chat show, Chicken Shop Date. And, yes, they are very cute together.

Garfield and Dimoldenberg have generated a fair amount of buzz thanks to a couple of flirty exchanges they shared (they initially met when Dimoldenberg was covering the red carpet at the GQ "Men of the Year 2022" event and shared another moment at the 2023 Golden Globes). So, when it became known that Garfield would appear on Chicken Shop Date — where Dimoldenberg queries celebrities in the manner of an often flirty, sometimes awkward date — the shipping reached next level.

The actual date, which dropped on Friday, was quite flirty and giggly, with the stoic Dimoldenberg appearing to fall victim to Garfield's intense stares, gentle teasing, and, at one point, hand holding. The conversation veered from both Brits' dating habits to Garfield's failure to win an Academy Award and even Dimoldenberg's interest in monogamy and parenthood ("What are your ultimate longings?," Garfield asked).

Mashable Top Stories

So, how did it end? There's definitely potential for a second date. Watch below:
